key_events: Artie confronted the Snack-O-Matic 3000 over a stuck bag of Zesty Ranch Habanero Hoops.
Artie attempted to rock the vending machine to dislodge his snack, triggering a massive power surge.
The electrical surge electrocuted Artie, leading to his physical death.
The System issued a notification declaring Artie 'TERMINATED' due to a critical error.
Artie's consciousness transitioned into 'The Great Login Screen in the Sky' white void.
Artie's corporate attire and wallet were converted into fantasy starter equipment.
Artie manifested in the void holding a Broken Tutorial Sword.
Fizz introduced herself as Artie's System Liaison and mocked his cause of death.
Artie reviewed his official [System Notification: Death Report].
The [Character Creation] menu was opened with 50 available points.
Artie reduced Strength, Agility, Intelligence, and Vitality to 1 to maximize Luck to 99.
Artie acquired the titles 'Statistical Anomaly' and 'The Glassest Cannon'.
Artie's final stats were confirmed as 1 HP, 1 MP, and 100% Critical Hit Rate.
Deployment to the tutorial zone, The Whispering Woods, was initiated.
Artie manifested in the Whispering Woods and confirmed his [1/1 HP] status.
Fizz explained the System's rounding rule where 0.1 damage becomes 1 damage.
A Level 1 Tutorial Slime attacked Artie with lunges and a ranged projectile.
Artie was cornered against a Patch-Note Oak that screams error messages when damaged.
The System issued a warning about the slime's Heavy Attack and Artie's near-zero survival probability.
Artie initiated a counter-attack with his Broken Tutorial Sword, triggering a guaranteed Critical Hit.
The slime's mass made contact with Artie's tunic as the strike landed.
Artie missed the Level 1 Slime 5 times due to his 1 Dexterity stat.
The slime charged a Heavy Attack that threatened to dissolve Artie.
Artie landed a Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit on the slime's core, deleting the creature.
The resulting blast destroyed a Patch-Note Oak and carved a fifty-foot furrow into the earth.
Artie reached Level 2.
Artie's Luck increased to 104 and he received a +1 Dexterity 'Pity Bonus'.
The Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit ability entered a 24-hour cooldown.
Artie received the 'Participation Trophy' (Cursed/Soul-bound) as an achievement for causing a Tier 3 System Error.
Fizz identified the trophy's hidden stats: Aura of the Beacon (+500% aggro) and Magnetic Failure (projectile attraction).
A Level 4 Tutorial Wolf and a swarm of other mobs aggroed on Artie due to the trophy's effects.
Artie fled North toward a ravine as the tutorial zone's stability dropped to 84%.
Artie narrowly dodged a slime projectile that curved toward him due to the trophy's Magnetic Failure.
Artie's stamina dropped to 42/100 during the frantic retreat.
Artie reached the Oakhaven Safe Zone, causing the monster aggro from the Participation Trophy to leash.
The Oakhaven gate scanner triggered a Fatal Error when analyzing Artie's 100% Crit Rate and 1 HP.
The System applied an emergency classification to Artie to resolve the data overflow.
Artie was assigned the title 'Statistical Anomaly'.
Artie entered Oakhaven officially, ending his time in the tutorial wilderness.
Artie's stamina dropped to 9/100 during the final sprint.
Artie entered the Mayor's office, noticing the high-level stats and opulent environment.
The Mayor identified Artie as a 'walking mint' due to his 100% Crit rate's economic potential.
The System issued the quest 'The Mayor’s Cut', demanding 500 gold or 10 crit-forged items.
Artie bluffed that his 1 HP was a 'Perfect Guard' build to prevent the Mayor from attacking.
Artie's stamina dropped to 12/100 and his hunger bar began flickering orange.
Artie exited the Mayor's office with the 'Mayor's Cut' quest active.
Vane intercepted Artie and identified him as a 'Statistical Anomaly'.
Vane initiated a 'Friendly' duel request which Artie declined through psychological manipulation.
Artie bluffed that his 1 HP build reflects 200% damage and guarantees crits on counters.
Vane sheathed his Masterwork Rapier and allowed Artie to leave, though he remains suspicious.
Artie's stamina dropped to 14/100 and hunger to 10/100.
Artie and Fizz decided to travel to the Low-Level Crypts to farm evasion gear.
must_stay_true: inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Broken Tutorial Sword (carried, container=hand_right)
inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Single Copper Coin (stowed, container=pockets)
location: The System Void (status: transitioning to Whispering Woods)
milestone: artie_died = DONE, milestone: system_login = DONE, milestone: build_confirmed = DONE
milestone: first_spawn = DONE, milestone: slime_encounter_start = DONE
Artie has 1 HP and 1 MP; any damage taken is lethal due to rounding rules.
Artie is currently in physical contact with a Level 1 Slime.
The Whispering Woods are mechanically hostile and recite patch notes.
Artie has 1 HP and 1 MP; any damage taken is lethal.
Artie is carrying the Participation Trophy in his left hand; it cannot be unequipped or stowed.
The Participation Trophy increases aggro by 500% and attracts projectiles.
Artie's Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit is on a 24-hour cooldown.
Artie has 1 HP and 100% Crit Rate.
Artie is carrying the Participation Trophy in his left hand (Soul-bound).
Artie is carrying the Broken Tutorial Sword in his right hand.
